name_fr: Centre de ressources en logement de l'Armée du Salut

description.en: Provides housing loss prevention, housing search assistance, and emergency homelessness diversion. Not an emergency shelter.
description.fr: Fournit une prévention de la perte de logement et une aide à la recherche de logement.

operations.hours: Mon, Tue, Thu, Fri: 8:30 AM – 4:30 PM. Wed: 1:00 PM – 4:30 PM.
operations.eligibility: Individuals or families homeless or at risk of homelessness.
operations.documents_required: ID, proof of income/expenses for financial assistance.

verification_notes: Confirmed location at Patrick Street, distinct from shelter.

description.en: Provides housing support and community residential facilities for women, particularly those in conflict with the law or at risk.
description.fr: Fournit un soutien au logement et des établissements résidentiels communautaires pour les femmes, en particulier celles qui ont des démêlés avec la justice.

operations.hours: Mon-Fri: 8:30 AM – 4:30 PM.
operations.eligibility: Women 18+ (Housing priority to those criminalized or at risk).

verification_notes: Public office is at 127 Charles St.

description.en: Provides emergency food hampers (approx. 7 days of food) to Kingston residents.
description.fr: Fournit des paniers de nourriture d'urgence aux résidents de Kingston.

operations.hours: Mon-Thu: 8:30 AM – 4:30 PM. Fri: 8:30 AM – 4:00 PM. (Closed 12:00 PM – 1:00 PM daily).
operations.eligibility: Residents of Kingston area in need of food.
operations.application_process: Appointment required. Call to book. No walk-ins.

description.en: Provides nutritious meals in a safe and welcoming environment. Offers indoor dining and takeout options.
description.fr: Fournit des repas nutritifs dans un environnement sûr et accueillant.

operations.hours: Mon-Fri: Breakfast 9-11 AM; Lunch 12-2 PM; Dinner 3-5 PM. Sat-Sun: Lunch 12-2 PM (Takeout).

verification_notes: Returned to full indoor dining service.

description.en: Provides emergency food bank services and community meals to the Rideau Heights neighborhood.
description.fr: Fournit des services de banque alimentaire d'urgence et des repas communautaires.

operations.hours: Food Bank: Tue & Thu 11:00 AM – 12:00 PM (By Appointment).

verification_notes: Specific hours for food bank verified.

name_en: St. Vincent de Paul Society of Kingston

description.en: Offers emergency food pantry, free clothing (WearHouse), and a daily lunch program (Loretta Hospitality).
description.fr: Offre un garde-manger d'urgence, des vêtements gratuits et un programme de déjeuner quotidien.

operations.hours: Pantry/WearHouse: Mon-Fri 9:00 AM – 1:00 PM. Lunch: Mon-Fri 11:30 AM – 1:00 PM.
operations.application_process: Drop-in for lunch/clothing. Register for pantry.

name_en: Lunch by George (Outreach St. George's Kingston)

description.en: Provides complimentary hot breakfast and lunch to those in need. Also offers clothing and social support.
description.fr: Fournit un petit-déjeuner et un déjeuner chauds gratuits aux personnes dans le besoin.

operations.hours: Mon-Fri: 9:00 AM – 12:30 PM (Breakfast 9-10:30, Lunch 11-12:30).

name_fr: La Boîte de bonne nourriture Kingston

description.en: Non-profit fresh fruit and vegetable distribution program. Participants order boxes at low cost and pick up on the third Thursday of the month.
description.fr: Programme de distribution de fruits et légumes frais à but non lucratif.

operations.hours: Pickup: 3rd Thursday of month. Office: Mon-Fri 8:30-4:30.
operations.application_process: Order online or at host sites by 2nd Thursday of month.

verification_notes: Clarified it is a purchase program, not free.

description.en: Connects people with healthy food through fresh food reclamation, community gardens, and cooking workshops.
description.fr: Relie les gens à une alimentation saine grâce à la récupération d'aliments frais, aux jardins communautaires et aux ateliers de cuisine.

operations.hours: Mon-Fri: 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM.

description.en: Provides free legal advice and representation to low-income residents regarding housing, income support, and employment law.
description.fr: Fournit des conseils juridiques gratuits et une représentation aux résidents à faible revenu.

operations.hours: Mon-Thu: 8:30 AM – 4:30 PM. Fri: 1:00 PM – 4:30 PM.
operations.eligibility: Low-income residents of Kingston and Frontenac County.

contact.address: 303 Bagot Street, Suite 500, Kingston, ON K7K 5W7

description.en: Provides legal services to low-income residents and students, handling summary conviction offences, tenant disputes, and tribunal hearings.
description.fr: Fournit des services juridiques aux résidents à faible revenu et aux étudiants.

operations.hours: Mon-Thu: 8:30 AM – 4:30 PM. Fri: 1:00 PM – 4:30 PM.

description.en: Employment and newcomer services offering job search assistance, workshops, and settlement support.
description.fr: Services d'emploi et aux nouveaux arrivants offrant une aide à la recherche d'emploi.

operations.hours: Mon-Fri: 8:30 AM – 4:30 PM. (Tue open to 6:00 PM).

name_en: City of Kingston - Housing and Social Services (Ontario Works)
name_fr: Ville de Kingston - Logement et services sociaux

description.en: Provides financial and employment assistance to people in financial need.
description.fr: Fournit une aide financière et d'emploi aux personnes dans le besoin.

operations.hours: Mon-Fri: 8:30 AM – 4:30 PM.
operations.eligibility: Residents of Kingston/Frontenac in financial need.
operations.documents_required: Proof of income, assets, shelter costs, ID.

description.en: Offers employment services and housing support to help individuals find work and maintain housing.
description.fr: Offre des services d'emploi et de soutien au logement.

operations.hours: Mon-Thu: 8:30 AM – 4:30 PM. Fri: 8:30 AM – 4:00 PM.

description.en: Provides employment and settlement services for French-speaking newcomers and residents.
description.fr: Fournit des services d'emploi et d'établissement pour les nouveaux arrivants et résidents francophones.

operations.hours: Mon: 8:30 AM – 6:00 PM. Tue-Thu: 8:30 AM – 4:30 PM. Fri: 8:30 AM – 3:00 PM.

contact.address: 31 Hyperion Court, Suite 100, Kingston, ON K7K 7G3

description.en: Provides mental health and autism services for children and youth.
description.fr: Fournit des services de santé mentale et d'autisme pour les enfants et les jeunes.

operations.hours: Mon-Fri: 8:30 AM – 4:30 PM.
operations.fees: Mental health is free. Some autism services fee-for-service.

description.en: Offers individual, family, and financial counselling.
description.fr: Offre des conseils individuels, familiaux et financiers.

operations.hours: Mon, Wed: 8:30 AM – 5:00 PM. Tue, Thu: 8:30 AM – 8:00 PM. Fri: 8:30 AM – 4:00 PM.

description.en: A community centre for older adults offering recreation, education, and social programs.
description.fr: Un centre communautaire pour les personnes âgées offrant des loisirs, de l'éducation et des programmes sociaux.

operations.hours: Mon-Fri: 8:30 AM – 4:30 PM.

contact.address: 541 Days Rd, Unit 6, Kingston, ON K7M 3R8

description.en: Provides residential and community support services for individuals with intellectual disabilities.
description.fr: Fournit des services résidentiels et de soutien communautaire aux personnes ayant une déficience intellectuelle.

operations.hours: Mon-Fri: 8:30 AM – 4:30 PM.

name_fr: YMCA de l'Est de l'Ontario - Kingston

description.en: Provides fitness, recreation, and childcare services.
description.fr: Fournit des services de conditionnement physique, de loisirs et de garde d'enfants.

operations.hours: Mon-Thu: 5:30 AM – 9:00 PM. Fri: 5:30 AM – 7:00 PM. Sat-Sun: 7:00 AM – 4:00 PM.

description.en: Provides after-school programs, camps, and recreation for children and youth.
description.fr: Fournit des programmes parascolaires, des camps et des loisirs pour les enfants et les jeunes.

operations.hours: Programs: Mon-Fri 3:00 PM – 8:00/8:30 PM.

description.en: An arts hub providing programming for adults with developmental disabilities and those facing barriers.
description.fr: Un carrefour artistique offrant une programmation pour les adultes ayant une déficience intellectuelle.

operations.hours: Mon-Fri: 8:30 AM – 3:30 PM.

description.en: Supports people with developmental disabilities to lead full lives in their communities.
description.fr: Soutient les personnes ayant une déficience intellectuelle.

operations.hours: Mon-Fri: 8:00 AM – 4:00 PM.

name_fr: Centre de ressources pour les familles des militaires de Kingston

description.en: Provides support services, childcare, and mental health resources for military families.
description.fr: Fournit des services de soutien, des services de garde et des ressources en santé mentale pour les familles des militaires.

operations.hours: Mon-Fri: 8:00 AM – 5:00 PM.

name_en: Kingston Frontenac Public Library - Central Branch
name_fr: Bibliothèque publique Kingston Frontenac - Succursale centrale

description.en: Main public library branch offering books, internet access, and community programs.
description.fr: Succursale principale de la bibliothèque publique.

operations.hours: Mon-Thu: 9 AM – 8 PM. Fri-Sat: 9 AM – 5 PM. Sun: 1 PM – 5 PM.
operations.eligibility: Open to all. Borrowing requires membership.
